name: Mimic Manic!
description:
(The game is still an early prototype)

Happy 5th anniversary of Prey(2017)! Do Yu want some more mimic hunting?

Yu can again report your feat to @yulo_tomorrow on Pytheas Lab... oops, on Twitter!

Control:

Left mouse button: Get and drag items (if applicable in the level)

Right mouse click: Hit with a wrench (if applicable in the level)

F: Get Psychoscope (if applicable in the level)
